Data will be collected before the first cycle of chemotherapy (T0), after chemotherapy (T1), and 6 months later (T2). The primary outcome for this study is muscle fiber size. Secondary outcomes are: regulators of muscle fiber size and function, indicators of cellular stress and mitochondrial function, myokines with potential antitumor effects, muscle strength, and cardiorespiratory fitness.
